mapper.select: SELECT s.sid, s.sname, u.icon, c.classname AS deptName, ck.address, CASE WHEN ck.status=1 THEN '正常' WHEN ck.status=2 THEN '迟到' END AS status, CASE WHEN ck.risk=1 THEN '低风险' WHEN ck.status=2 THEN '中风险' WHEN ck.status=3 THEN '高风险' END AS risk, DATE_FORMAT(ck.create_time,'%H:%i') AS checkinTime, ck.date FROM sys_user AS u LEFT JOIN student as s ON s.stuid = u.login_name LEFT JOIN classinfo as c ON s.classid = c.classid LEFT JOIN tb_checkin AS ck ON u.id = ck.user_id AND ck.date = CURRENT_DATE WHERE u.id = #{userId} AND u.clock=0
mapper.insert:
